import React,{useState} from 'react'; import { Card, Icon, Image,Form, Button , Message, Segment, Grid, Divider} from 'semantic-ui-react' const About = () => { const [query, setQuery] =useState({ name:'', email:'', cellphone:'', message: '', mEmail : '', MPhone:'' }) const {name, email, message, method, cellphone} = query; const handleChange = (e) =>setQuery({...query, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}); console.log() return( Or Puseletso Founder Puseletso is the founder of Be youtiful Nails. 068-2929-079 be-younail@gmail.com
Submit
) } export default About
